amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on requests for funds for military operations in Iraq and Afghanistan for fiscal years after fiscal year 2007.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3709 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 101.

action.text: Amendment SA 3709 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S3673-3674, S3675; text: CR S3674) To express the sense of the Senate on requests for funds for military operations in Iraq and Afghanistan for fiscal years after fiscal year 2007.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3709 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3709 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 101.
